entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
